text: And taking Him up on a high mountain,Just three known Greek manuscripts, of objectively inferior quality (against over 1,700), omit “up on a high mountain the devil” (to be followed by NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc., except that some keep ‘the devil’, but not the rest). the devil showed Him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.This is obviously supernatural. Even from a satellite you cannot see the whole world at once, because it is a sphere.
